Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/boot

What you'll find here: programs to enable one to boot a Linux partition

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

dualboot/
boot Linux from other OSs
ethernet/
tools for booting Linux over Ethernet
init/
init-time programs to start system services after boot
lilo/
autoboots from a hard drive w/ menu choice of os
loaders/
non-lilo interactive boot loaders
patch-non640k-2.0.36.gz (LSM entry) (README) 1999-04-28
allows 2.0.10 to boot on machines with < 640k conv mem (11981 bytes)
